description.koreana: 한 플레이 회차 동안 영웅의 제단에서 깃털 3개 구매
description.spanish: Compra 3 plumas del Altar de los héroes en una sola tanda
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中从英雄祭坛购买3根羽毛
description.tchinese: 在一局遊戲中，從英雄聖壇購買 3 根羽毛
description.russian: Купить 3 пера с алтаря героев за одну игру
description.japanese: 1回のプレイで英雄の祭壇で羽を3枚購入する
description.polish: Kup trzy pióra z ołtarza bohaterów w jednej sesji
description.brazilian: Compre 3 penas do Altar dos Heróis em uma única partida

description.english: Have 20 or more magical objects equiped during a single run
description.german: Rüste 20 oder mehr magische Gegenstände während eines einzigen Durchgangs aus
description.french: Équiper 20 objets magiques ou plus en une seule partie
description.italian: Equipaggia 20 o più oggetti magici in una singola partita

description.spanish: Lleva 20 o más objetos mágicos equipados durante una sola tanda
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中装备20个或以上魔法物品
description.tchinese: 在一局遊戲中，裝備 20 個以上的魔法物品
description.russian: Снарядить не менее 20 магических предметов в одной игре
description.japanese: 1回のプレイでマジカルオブジェクトを20個以上入手する
description.polish: Wyposaż 20 lub więcej magicznych przedmiotów w jednej sesji
description.brazilian: Tenha 20 ou mais objetos mágicos equipados durante uma única partida

description.english: Have 9 Legendary Talents in a single run

description.spanish: Consigue 9 talentos legendarios en una sola tanda
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中拥有9个传奇天赋
description.tchinese: 在一局遊戲中，裝備 9 個傳說天賦
description.russian: Иметь 9 легендарных талантов за одну игру
description.japanese: 1回のプレイでレジェンドの素質を9個得る
description.polish: Zdobądź dziewięć legendarnych talentów w jednej sesji
description.brazilian: Tenha 9 Talentos Lendários em uma única partida

description.english: Revive 3 heroes at the same time
description.german: Belebe 3 Helden gleichzeitig wieder
description.french: Réscussiter 3 héros en même temps
description.italian: Resuscita 3 eroi contemporaneamente

description.tchinese: 同時復活 3 名英雄
description.russian: Возродить одновременно 3 героев
description.japanese: 同時に3人のヒーローを復活させる
description.polish: Wskrześ trzech bohaterów w tym samym czasie
description.brazilian: Reviva 3 heróis ou heroínas ao mesmo tempo

displayName.english: All is well that ends well
displayName.french: Tout est bien qui finit bien
displayName.italian: Tutto è bene quel che finisce bene
displayName.spanish: Bien está lo que bien acaba
displayName.japanese: 終わりよければすべてよし
displayName.polish: Wszystko dobre, co się dobrze kończy
displayName.brazilian: Tudo fica bem quando acaba bem

description.english: Defeat Baba Yaga without using any Raven Feather
description.german: Besiege Baba Jaga, ohne Rabenfedern zu verwenden
description.french: Vaincre Baba Yaga sans utiliser de plume de corbeau

description.spanish: Derrota a Baba Yagá sin usar ninguna pluma de cuervo
description.schinese: 在不使用任何鸦羽的情况下击败雅加婆婆
description.tchinese: 不使用烏鴉羽毛擊敗雅加婆婆
